title: Pamela's Prayer (Christian Movie)
description:
Pamela&#039;s Prayer (Christian Movie)


A dramatic movie about purity before marriage. 

Released in 1998 by Dave Christiano Films This motion picture portrays the unique and heartfelt story of Pamela Bucklin from her birth in 1969 to her wedding day in 1991. It also contrasts two Christian girls and their different outlook toward purity and dating. All of Pamela&#039;s friends were dating. She was not. And it seemed unfair that her father insisted on such a high standard of purity. Yes, it seemed unfair...until the day she married..

God has a plan for everyone. Only if we abide by his plan for us will we be able to find true happiness.

This film gives a powerful presentation of what true Christian Life should be and is very evangelistic! 
Highly recommended for teen to adult audiences especially Teenage Girls. If financially possible, please buy the DVD to keep Christian films in business ......

Cast: Rick Scheideman, Serena Orrego, Ted Kuenz, Sarah Padbury 
Writer, Producer, Director: Dave Christiano 
Language: English
Subtitles: None
Runtime: 57 Minutes
My Rating: 10/10

Please seed for as long as possible. Let others also come to know that there is Salvation only in the name of Jesus Christ.

Uploaded by Indian Christian
